statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -13 \\ -10 \\ 9 \\ -17 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 5 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -13 \\ -10 \\ 9 \\ -17 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
